title.rendered: CFC conducts cyber safety awareness session for children

content.rendered:
With Covid – 19 changing the way we conduct our daily activities, our daily business, our daily classes, we have realized that the future is all digital. Smile Foundation’s Child for Child team aims to prepare students and their parents for any impending online disasters that could wreak havoc in their daily lives. The team tied up with Nex Schools to provide sessions on Cyber security to their homes, to educate on how to manage digital presence and how to ensure that parents and your children remain protected.

The aspects that were covered in the session included, building student’s awareness on internet safety, building positive digital footprints, being prepared for next gen technology and to teach students what information is appropriate to share & what kind of interactions to avoid.

The duration of workshop was 60 minutes and the students were trained by Ms. Mardula Singh, CEO Nex Schools, Pune. She has been working in the field of Cyber Safety for the past 2 decades and runs many sessions for students in the stated topic.
